long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension enhances MLIA by adding features and improving design.

MLIx gives you larger buttons for voting on and saving your favorite stories. The new buttons are compact and simple, so they don't slow down the site.

I've also taken the liberty of providing a button that will instantly copy a chosen story to your clipboard, saving you the hassle of selecting a story when you want to share it.

I'm not affiliated with MyLifeIsAverage.com; I just like reading it.

Issues? Comments? Email me at tyler.wayne.dev@gmail.com. Put MLIx somewhere in the subject and I'll be grateful. A GitHub repository will be coming soon, but for now that email address will have to do.
